Package net.silthus.schat.channel

package net.silthus.schat.channel
Contains the classes for creating and managing Channels.
  • Class
    Description
    Channel
    The channel is a message target that forwards messages sent to it to all joined targets.
    Channel.Builder
    The builder of a Channel.
    Channel.InvalidKey
    The exception is thrown if a channel with an invalid key is created.
    ChannelPrototype
    Internal utility for configuring the prototype of channels.
    ChannelRepository
    Holds all channels registered on the server.
    ChannelRepository.DuplicateChannel
    The exception is thrown if someone tries to add a channel with the same key to the repository.
    ChannelSettings
    Holds references to all common settings of a Channel.
    PrivateChannel
    Prototype class for configuring the settings of a private channel.
